## ResourceManager.instantiatePrefab() method

Instantiate a prefab from a JSON file via VFS.

**Signature:**

```typescript
instantiatePrefab(parent: SceneNode, path: string): Promise<SceneNode>;
```

</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description

</td><td>

[SceneNode](doc/markdown/./scene.scenenode.md)


</td><td>

Parent node to attach the instantiated prefab to.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

path


</td><td>

string


</td><td>

Path to the prefab JSON file in VFS.


</td></tr>

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;[SceneNode](doc/markdown/./scene.scenenode.md)<!-- -->&gt;

A Promise resolving to the instantiated `SceneNode`<!-- -->, or `null` on failure.
